definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: To her horror, she saw him fall.
sentences.chinese: 她看見他跌下驚恐萬狀。

sentences.english: He was filled with astonishment at seeing the dead body.
sentences.chinese: 他看見屍體時驚恐萬狀。

sentences.english: This shows they are scared and terror-stricken.
People ran for the exits, screaming out in terror.
sentences.chinese: 人們驚恐萬狀，尖叫着奔向出口。

sentences.english: His brother was alarmed at the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 他的哥哥遭到搶劫，驚恐萬狀。

sentences.english: The other students kept being horrified all over again.
sentences.chinese: 其他的學生們又一次驚恐萬狀起來。
